string-array.name: kpt_suggestion_mode_strings
string-array.item: Please install a dictionary to start using Adaptxt

resources.string: Do you want to disable or uninstall this add-on?
Accents and diacritics will be removed from the text. Are you sure you want to continue?

Your dictionaries need to be updated to support the new auto spacing feature.
 Tap on OK to access the Adaptxt Store and update the dictionaries now.
Do you want to delete the custom gesture?
Please log in to the appstore to complete your purchase. Would you like to do this now?
Do you want to delete all the custom gestures?
Adaptxt needs access to your location. Please turn on Location Services.

Application-based suggestions work best when Adaptxt learns your writing pattern from your social accounts and Gmail. Tap on the respective application after dismissing the dialog to enable learning from applications.
Only 1 location can be saved at a time. Delete a location to add another location.
Do you want to delete the active location?
Adaptxt will not learn new words and context.
Adaptxt will start learning words and context again.
*Please enter a minimum of 3 characters as an expansion
*This shortcut already exists, please enter a different shortcut
*The shortcut field cannot be empty. Create a shortcut of 3 characters or alternatively use the AutoFill button to generate a shortcut from the expansion
Are you sure you want to delete all shortcuts and expansions?
The word you have entered already exists, please enter a different one.
Only 5 add-ons can be used at a time. Please uninstall any of the installed add-ons and try again.
Play Store Add-ons are no longer compatible. Please download the add-ons from our server. Click on this notification to be directed to the Adaptxt Store view.
Incompatible Add-on. Tap here to update.
Only two Add-Ons can be downloaded simultaneously
Only 5 add-ons can be used at a time. Please uninstall any of the installed add-ons and try again.
Connection error, please check your network connectivity and try again
Connection timed out, please try again
Please install a dictionary add-on to enable this feature.
Automatically capitalize proper nouns and words at the beginning of a sentence
Control auto correction and touch feedback settings
The shortcut must be from 2 to 4 characters (numbers and symbols are not allowed)
Provides suggestions based on the application being used
Log in to Gmail for Adaptxt to start learning
Keyboard layouts, auto correction, touch feedback and more
Automatically add a space when selecting suggestions or punctuation according to the language rules
Customize long press duration on keypress
Update your dictionaries automatically with new words based on recent trends
Select a location for which you want Adaptxt to provide relevant suggestions
Restore words that you previously backed up
You have not backed up any words to be restored
Dictionary updates are available for Adaptxt. Tap here to view and download.
New languages are available for Adaptxt. Tap here to view and download
A new version of Adaptxt is available. Tap here to view and download
New themes are available for Adaptxt. Tap here to view and download.
You can customize your Adaptxt keyboard using the Keyboard customization feature. Tap here to find out more.
No Internet Connection. Please check your connection and
Glide is still a beta feature. We would like you to participate in improving it with your feedback.
Adaptxt is introducing a new revolutionary way to input text.Tap on this message to find out more..
Upgrade to the full version of Adaptxt
The character you have chosen is already assigned to another shortcut
Enable/disable Glide and customize gesture shortcuts
Customize the display of keys to undo or dismiss auto correction
Slide over the letters to form words without lifting the finger
Glide is still a beta feature. Help us improve it with your valuable feedback
Personal dictionary, ATR shortcuts, suggestions based on location, applications and social accounts
Create your own shortcuts to type even faster
Display a bubble containing accented characters on press and hold of a key
When it\'s ON > Accent bubbles are displayed. When it\'s OFF > Accent bubbles are not displayed
No text has been entered in the text field.
This feature or add-on is only supported for devices running Android v2.2 and above.
Accents and diacritics have been removed from the text.
Please ensure that your device time is accurate by setting it to \"Automatic\" under \"Date and time\" in your device settings.
This feature is not supported in this text editor
Use the slider to modify the suggestion bar height.
This location has already been saved under Saved Locations.
Insufficient phone memory to back up your dictionary words
Sorry, this location is not currently supported
You are about to delete the account
Adaptxt learns from your address book
Add or remove your social accounts
At least one dictionary must be selected
Device is already registered on server.
*The expansion must be less than 256 characters.
Please update all your add-ons as the current version of Adaptxt is incompatible with them
Max custom gestures are created. Please delete few and create again
SD card not found, backup failed
There is no enough space in SD card to back up,, backup failed
Please wait until dictionary is enabled/disabled and context is updated.
Please set the %1$s constant and recompile the app.
From GCM: server deleted %1$d pending messages!
Please update Adaptxt as the following add-ons updated are incompatible:
Please tap here to update Adaptxt base
The add-on installed is not compatible
Adaptxt will learn from your social network accounts, contacts and messages to provide personalized suggestions
Do you want to back up your data?
A new version of Adaptxt is available; do you want to update now?
Are you sure you want to delete all words in My dictionary?
Adaptxt is learning Android dictionary words
Android dictionary words will be learned
Connection error, please check your network connectivity and try again
Downloading the latest Add-On list and loading previously installed Add-Ons. This might take a while depending on the number of Add-Ons
Could not register device on Demo Server after %1$d attempts.
From Demo Server: successfully added device!
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on Demo Server.
Could not unregister device on Demo Server (%1$s).
From Demo Server: successfully removed device!
Your %s account has been added successfully.
Your %s account has been deleted from Adaptxt only.
Keyboard layout to be changed as per the add-on installed
The default keyboard language can be changed using the space bar or by accessing the Prioritize Add-Ons tab after installation
Speech Recognizer not available on this device
